video.title: Rubi
video.synopsis: Ruby, jealous of her wealthy best friend Maribel, cooks up a scheme to marry a millionaire. Hector, Maribel's boyfriend, is her target.

episodes.synopsis: Rubí can't hide that she's jealous of Maribel. Cristina, Rubí's sister, loses her job. Maribel's boyfriend, Héctor, is coming to Mexico.
episodes.title: Capítulo 1

episodes.synopsis: Rubí and Alejandro, Héctor's friend, fall for each other right away. Maribel organizes a dinner to welcome Héctor and introduce him to her dad.
episodes.title: Capítulo 2

episodes.synopsis: Héctor goes to his godparents, who are like his parents; they want to meet Maribel. Doña Refugio, Rubí's mom, has health problems and little money.
episodes.title: Capítulo 3

episodes.synopsis: Héctor's godparents meet Maribel and her father. Her disability comes as a surprise. Rubí's mom gets very ill, but fortunately Alejandro treats her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 4

episodes.synopsis: Maribel meets Rubí's mom for the first time. Héctor talks to his partner and accepts the project in NY; he plans to ask Maribel to marry him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 5

episodes.synopsis: Héctor and Maribel become engaged. Héctor's godfather wants to stop the marriage, and Maribel's dad doesn't like the idea of her moving to NY.
episodes.title: Capítulo 6

episodes.synopsis: Maribel's dad gives the couple his blessing. Alejandro tells Rubí that he doesn't come from money as she thought, so she breaks up with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 7

episodes.synopsis: Rubí's mother is hospitalized after she argues with Rubí. Rubí grows more jealous of Maribel; feigning affection, she makes malicious comments.
episodes.title: Capítulo 8

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro tries to make Rubí see that what matters is their love, but her ambition is too great. Héctor's godfather finally accepts Maribel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 9

episodes.synopsis: Maribel organizes a dinner to announce her wedding. Héctor's godparents, Maribel's dad, Rubí, and Alejandro are present. Rubí envies Maribel's joy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 10

episodes.synopsis: Rubí flirts with Héctor and manages to get a job working with him in his godfather's office. When Alejandro finds out, he argues with Héctor.
episodes.title: Capítulo 11

episodes.synopsis: Once in the office, Rubí turns up the flirting. Héctor begins to fall for it neglecting his attention to Maribel. Alejandro's fears are coming true.
episodes.title: Capítulo 12

episodes.synopsis: Don Genaro lies to his wife and goes to visit his other family. Héctor frets about Rubí's influence and argues with Maribel, who fears losing him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 13

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro sees his parents and his sister Sofía in Cancun. Luis and Sofía start to fall for each other; Don Genaro's secrets might be exposed.
episodes.title: Capítulo 14

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro's parents realize that Dr. Bermúdez took the credit for their son's research. To be safe, Genaro decides to return to Mexico with his son.
episodes.title: Capítulo 15

episodes.synopsis: Rubí and Héctor kiss. He is confused and sees less of Maribel. Rubí spins a web of deceit. Alejandro is assigned an important project at the hospital.
episodes.title: Capítulo 16

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro returns and Rubí realizes she loves him despite the lack of money. Marco and Cayetano, Maribel's driver, woo Cristina, Rubí's sister.
episodes.title: Capítulo 17

episodes.synopsis: Genaro sees what's happening between Rubí and Héctor and makes him question his marriage to Maribel. Rubí goes with Maribel to see her wedding gown.
episodes.title: Capítulo 18

episodes.synopsis: Cristina chooses Cayetano over Marco. Genaro tells his family he must travel again, on a business trip, but really he goes back to his other wife.
episodes.title: Capítulo 19

episodes.synopsis: Héctor forgets to take the documents to the church; Maribel's heartbroken over his neglect. Alejandro's mom's memory gets worse by the day.
episodes.title: Capítulo 20

episodes.synopsis: Genaro's suspicions are confirmed when Héctor tells him that he loves Rubí. At Maribel's bridal shower, Rubí treats her mom and sister very badly.
episodes.title: Capítulo 21

episodes.synopsis: Rubí's mom gets upset when she finds out that Maribel's dad is paying Rubí's tuition. Alejandro confesses to Rubí that he still loves her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 22

episodes.synopsis: Rubí disapproves of Cristina's and Cayetano's relationship because he's just a driver. Héctor makes up his mind about marrying Maribel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 23

episodes.synopsis: Héctor tells Rubí they must end their relationship; she has other, less noble intentions. Maribel begins to see that Rubí hides things from her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 24

episodes.synopsis: Genaro lets Rubí know he's aware of what's going on with Héctor, and she responds with a haughty attitude. Maribel's physiotherapy shows promise.
episodes.title: Capítulo 25

episodes.synopsis: Rubí continues to appeal to Héctor's carnal appetite as she herself becomes a bit more stuck on him. Loreto realizes how jealous Rubí is of Maribel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 26

episodes.synopsis: Rubí and Alejandro give each other another chance. Héctor goes to Valle de Bravo to get away from Rubí. Rubí steals her neighbor's savings.
episodes.title: Capítulo 27

episodes.synopsis: Once again Rubí puts her ambition ahead of true love and seeks out Héctor to keep messing with him. Alejandro tells Maribel why Rubí left him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 28

episodes.synopsis: Héctor confesses he was jealous of Alejandro. Rubí gets Héctor to fall for her again. Alejandro takes up Maribel's therapy treatment.
episodes.title: Capítulo 29

episodes.synopsis: On the wedding day, Héctor is planning to run away with Rubí and leave Maribel at the altar. Lorena finds out and tells Alejandro minutes before.
episodes.title: Capítulo 30

episodes.synopsis: Maribel sees Rubí and Héctor as they run away together. Alejandro takes a heartbroken Maribel home and looks after her. Rubí's mom is distressed.
episodes.title: Capítulo 31

episodes.synopsis: Rubí can't forget Alejandro. Maribel has a nervous breakdown, and Alejandro is the only one that can calm her down. Héctor's out of the NY project.
episodes.title: Capítulo 32

episodes.synopsis: Luis runs into Héctor and Rubí in Cancun. Yago Pietrasanta, the owner of the hotel where Rubí and Héctor are staying, is dazzled by her beauty.
episodes.title: Capítulo 33

episodes.synopsis: Elisa goes to Cancun to tell Héctor that Rubí is only with him because of his money and that he must go back to Maribel. He tells her it's too late.
episodes.title: Capítulo 34

episodes.synopsis: When Héctor goes to apologize to Maribel, she thinks he's come back for her, but finds out that he married Rubí. Rubí's mom disowns her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 35

episodes.synopsis: Due to Pietrasanta's indiscretion, Héctor learns that Luis is Genaro's son. Rubí hopes that she may come to love Héctor one day and be happy with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 36

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro runs into Rubí and Héctor at a party, and the two men fight over her. Alejandro tells Héctor she's only with him because of his money.
episodes.title: Capítulo 37

episodes.synopsis: Yago tells Rubí he likes her. Rubí's mother can't pay the rent and is evicted, but Cayetano pays it using the money he'd saved for his wedding.
episodes.title: Capítulo 38

episodes.synopsis: Maribel's dad looks into Héctor's and Genaro's businesses for a way to ruin them. Victoria backs Alejandro's project and wants the signature tested.
episodes.title: Capítulo 39

episodes.synopsis: Elisa and Lilia, Genaro's wives, run into each other at his office. Sonia thinks about leaving Yago but can't find the strength to do it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 40

episodes.synopsis: While Héctor's away, Rubí tells Alejandro that she loves him and needs him. Héctor's growing suspicious and finds out about some of Rubí's lies.
episodes.title: Capítulo 41

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro finds out that Rubí's at Yago's and tells her not to do to him what she did to Héctor. Sonia leaves Yago when she realizes he's after Rubí.
episodes.title: Capítulo 42

episodes.synopsis: Maribel and her dad argue; he doesn't want her go to Cancun. Héctor tells Rubí that Genaro's retaining control of his money to test her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 43

episodes.synopsis: Maribel pays Rubí a visit in Cancun to let her know that she's changed and to expect retaliation. She kisses Héctor and tells him she still loves him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 44

episodes.synopsis: Luis catches his dad kissing Elisa; Genaro tells him she's his wife. Luis breaks up with Sofía for covering up the truth, and Genaro's hospitalized.
episodes.title: Capítulo 45

episodes.synopsis: Lilia and Elisa run into each other at the hospital and find out the truth. Rubí's mom goes to see her to have a talk. Lore spurs Paco's hope.
episodes.title: Capítulo 46

episodes.synopsis: Rubí finds Héctor and Maribel kissing. Lorena tells Saúl that who she really loves is Paco. Arturo runs into Lilia, an ex-girlfriend from years ago.
episodes.title: Capítulo 47

episodes.synopsis: Saúl tells Paco Lorena won't be happy because he has no money. Paco, Victoria's son, has money but doesn't want it known. Cayetano is arrested.
episodes.title: Capítulo 48

episodes.synopsis: Victoria's disappointed in Alejandro, who's blamed for something he didn't do. Sonia quits working for Yago to be with Alejandro.
episodes.title: Capítulo 49

episodes.synopsis: In a fit of jealousy, Héctor hits Alejandro; Sonia and Alejandro break up over his feelings for Rubí. Yago abuses Sonia and Alejandro loses his job.
episodes.title: Capítulo 50

episodes.synopsis: Rubí tells Yago she'll never be his. Elisa tells Genaro she'll never give him the divorce, and Lilia leaves him. Cristina confirms she's pregnant.
episodes.title: Capítulo 51

episodes.synopsis: With Maribel's help, Alejandro proves he's innocent. Victoria apologizes for doubting him. Rubí confesses to her mom that she sent Cayetano to jail.
episodes.title: Capítulo 52

episodes.synopsis: Rubí's mother dies from the shock on hearing Rubí's confession; Rubí's remorseful. When she arrives at the cemetery, Cristina calls her a murderer.
episodes.title: Capítulo 53

episodes.synopsis: On Rubí's advice, Elisa sues Genaro for bigamy. Lilia tells Genaro that Arturo is Luis' father. Alejandro's feelings for Maribel grow stronger.
episodes.title: Capítulo 54

episodes.synopsis: Doña Lola thinks Paco's being unfaithful to Lorena, unaware that the other woman is his mother. Cristina tells Cayetano she's pregnant.
episodes.title: Capítulo 55

episodes.synopsis: Confronted by Lorena, Paco's forced to confess that Victoria Gallegos is his mother. At a party, Rubí overhears that Maribel's in love with Alejandro.
episodes.title: Capítulo 56

episodes.synopsis: Genaro's released, Alejandro asks Sonia to marry him, and Maribel's surgery is successful. Marco looks after Cristina and her daughter, Fernanda.
episodes.title: Capítulo 57

episodes.synopsis: Marco still loves Cristina and hopes for a chance. Rubí wants Alejandro now that he has money. Sonia tells Maribel about her wedding with Alejandro.
episodes.title: Capítulo 58

episodes.synopsis: Rubí tells Héctor she needs time; he doesn't know what to make of her attitude. Minutes before his wedding, Rubí tells Alejandro she'll wait for him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 59

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro ignores Rubí's words and goes through with the wedding. Cristina and Marco give themselves a chance, and Elisa and Arturo start dating.
episodes.title: Capítulo 60

episodes.synopsis: Because of the incurable disease that will affect his mobility, Héctor decides to set Rubí free. She can't resign herself to losing Alejandro.
episodes.title: Capítulo 61

episodes.synopsis: Rubí encourages Yago's advances. Cristina finds out Cayetano's free. Maribel confesses to Sonia that she's loved Alejandro for years.
episodes.title: Capítulo 62

episodes.synopsis: Héctor leaves for treatment. Knowing that Cristina harbors hopes for Cayetano drives Marco away. Alejandro warns Rubí to stay away.
episodes.title: Capítulo 63

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro finds out about Yago and Rubí and goes looking for her. He and Yago fight and Rubí defends Alejandro. Luis reveals his feelings for Maribel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 64

episodes.synopsis: Yago tells Rubí that if she doesn't go through with their date Alejandro might suffer an accident, so she's forced to spend the night with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 65

episodes.synopsis: Marco sees how much Maribel loves Alejandro. Rubí finds out that Maribel and Luis are half-siblings. Héctor returns to Mexico and to Rubí.
episodes.title: Capítulo 66

episodes.synopsis: Rubí meets Cristina's daughter, Fernanda. Yago cancels all his contracts with Héctor. Héctor thanks Alejandro for what he did for Rubí.
episodes.title: Capítulo 67

episodes.synopsis: Rubí goes to see Sonia and they argue over Alejandro. Right after, Sonia is killed in an accident; Alejandro finds her and learns she was pregnant.
episodes.title: Capítulo 68

episodes.synopsis: Marco asks Cristina to marry him. Alejandro's research earns him an award. Paco tries to woo Lorena before returning to  Spain. Héctor meets Elena.
episodes.title: Capítulo 69

episodes.synopsis: Rubí tells Maribel that Luis is her half-brother. Rubí tries to convince Alejandro that she's changed. Cayetano gets a job thanks to Don Arturo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 70

episodes.synopsis: Héctor learns that Rubí's taking contraceptives to not have his child, so he leaves. Elena takes advantage of the situation to get closer to him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 71

episodes.synopsis: Yago dies in a mysterious accident. Sofía helps Luis to quit drinking when she finds out he is Arturo's son. Héctor cancels Rubí's credit cards.
episodes.title: Capítulo 72

episodes.synopsis: Sinópsis por Segmento: --- Aspectos: --- Distribución: --- Alemania Antena 3 España Arabia Argentina Cable Distribución Canadiense Canal Castilla La Mancha Canal TLNovela Portugués.
episodes.title: Capítulo 73

episodes.synopsis: Héctor keeps a very close watch on Rubí. Alejandro and Maribel start to see more of each other. Blinded by jealousy, Héctor lashes out at Rubí.
episodes.title: Capítulo 74

episodes.synopsis: Rubí sells her shares of the hotel behind Héctor's back. Alejandro's mom tells Maribel that Rubí was with Sonia the day she died.
episodes.title: Capítulo 75

episodes.synopsis: Cayetano doesn't want to let Cristina go. Ernesto gets a job at the hospital to avenge his father, Dr. Bermúdez. Rubí feels very sure of Alejandro.
episodes.title: Capítulo 76

episodes.synopsis: Cristina's very confused about her feelings. Genaro sees that Héctor abuses Rubí. Marco steps aside so that Cristina and Cayetano may be happy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 77

episodes.synopsis: Héctor tells Rubí he's going on a business trip with Elena. Alejandro goes on a trip and runs into Rubí who's in Cancun to sell her house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 78

episodes.synopsis: Luis and Genaro patch things up. Ernesto gets closer to Maribel as he seeks revenge. Elisa looks for Arturo and gets jealous when she sees Victoria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 79

episodes.synopsis: Elena's fear of insects brings her closer to Héctor. Alejandro encounters resistance from his family when he tells them that he plans to marry Rubí.
episodes.title: Capítulo 80

episodes.synopsis: Elena tells Héctor she might fall in love if she doesn't put some distance between them. Rubí tries to tell Alejandro what happened with Sonia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 81

episodes.synopsis: Maribel and Sofía suspect Rubí was with Sonia when she died. They tell Alejandro about their suspicions, and his mother confirms it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 82

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro asks Rubí about Sonia's death, but he doesn't believe her. Maribel's nanny wants to speak to Héctor about Rubí, but she dies before.
episodes.title: Capítulo 83

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro files charges against Rubí for the death of his wife and child, and she's arrested. Arturo and Elisa tell Maribel they plan to get married.
episodes.title: Capítulo 84

episodes.synopsis: There isn't enough evidence against Rubí, and El Conde speeds up her release. Elena tells Rubí that Héctor will eventually fall in love with her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 85

episodes.synopsis: Elena finds the document where Héctor authorizes Rubí to sell her part of the shares and informs him of it. Fernanda suffers an accident.
episodes.title: Capítulo 86

episodes.synopsis: Rubí faints and finds out she's pregnant. When Alejandro realizes Rubí's not guilty of Sonia's death, he wants her back but she can't forgive him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 87

episodes.synopsis: Rubí knows the baby is Alejandro's. He gets his hopes up, but Héctor--very confidently--tells him it isn't his. Maribel tells Alejandro she loves him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 88

episodes.synopsis: Rubí dashes Maribel's hopes when she tells her she's expecting Alejandro's baby. Alejandro's disillusioned to see that Rubí continues to lie to him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 89

episodes.synopsis: Ernesto falls in love with Maribel, all the more reason to want to destroy Alejandro. El Conde is prepared to help Ernesto achieve his revenge.
episodes.title: Capítulo 90

episodes.synopsis: Elena tells Hector she is upset he will be a father and she loves him. Hector learns the truth about the baby and is willing to kill Alejandro.
episodes.title: Capítulo 91

episodes.synopsis: Elena can't bear to see Hector upset. The Count tells Maribel he's interested in her. Hector is still angry and keeps Rubí imprisoned and monitored.
episodes.title: Capítulo 92

episodes.synopsis: Ernesto's dad gets out of jail with help. Alejandro and Maribel start to see each other. Elisa doesn't believe Rubí. Hector goes to Elisa's wedding.
episodes.title: Capítulo 93

episodes.synopsis: Rubí asks the plumber, who just happens to know Dolores and Cristina, to go to her house. Alejandro is poisoned by Bermúdez, who is now free.
episodes.title: Capítulo 94

episodes.synopsis: Marco searches for Hector thinking he poisoned him. Hector admits to Rubí he poisoned Alejandro. The plumber helps Rubí escape with Loreto's help.
episodes.title: Capítulo 95

episodes.synopsis: Hector looks for Rubí at the hospital, sees Alejandro and tells him he is innocent. Rubí, hiding from Hector, seeks shelter at Cayetano's place.
episodes.title: Capítulo 96

episodes.synopsis: Lore and Paco help Ingrid, who got in trouble with Paco at the university. Cayetano tells Hector the reason why he was in jail.
episodes.title: Capítulo 97

episodes.synopsis: They discover that someone at the hospital tried to poison Hector. Elena tries to get Hector to see he is wrong. Ingrid falls in love with Paco.
episodes.title: Capítulo 98

episodes.synopsis: Cayetano allow Fernanda and Marco to go out. Genero realizes how insane Hector is and gets Rubí out of Hector's house, taking her to Alejandro's.
episodes.title: Capítulo 99

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro tells Rubí he loves Maribel. Elisa is shocked to learn all about Hector, and Genaro fears Hector has the same deadly disease his father had.
episodes.title: Capítulo 100

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro leaves his home, leaving Rubí there. Maribel leaves Alejandro for his son. The Count tells Arturo he will marry Maribel. Hector wants Elena.
episodes.title: Capítulo 101

episodes.synopsis: Hector takes a trip with Elena. Rubí makes Alejandro believe she doesn't just want his money but his love. Rubí loses her baby in an accident.
episodes.title: Capítulo 102

episodes.synopsis: Rubí doesn't tell anyone she lost her baby. Gernaro doesn't want Luis to go to Switzerland with Sofia. Elena gets kicked out of her mother's house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 103

episodes.synopsis: Bermúdez scares Maribel. Alejandro tells Rubí he will marry her only because of the child, but he's not convincing. Elena reconciles with her mother.
episodes.title: Capítulo 104

episodes.synopsis: Hector tells Alejandro he will never divorce Rubí. Alejandro listens to Rubí and sees she hasn't changed. Rubí finds Hector and Elena in bed together.
episodes.title: Capítulo 105

episodes.synopsis: Elena decides to leave Hector because he couldn't defend her in front of Rubí. Hector goes after Rubí. The Count tells Maribel he's in love with her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 106

episodes.synopsis: Rubí gets Hector to believe that he is to blame for her losing their child. Alejandro and Maribel, soon to married, return to Mexico.
episodes.title: Capítulo 107

episodes.synopsis: Synopsis by Segment: --- Aspects: --- Distribution: --- Germany Antenna 3 Spain Arabia Argentina Cable Distribution Canadian Channel Castile-La Mancha Telenovela Channel Portuguese Ca.
episodes.title: Capítulo 108

episodes.synopsis: Rubí confesses to Hector that he didn't make her lose her baby. He gets enraged and assaults her, and everyone witnesses. Hector gets in an accident.
episodes.title: Capítulo 109

episodes.synopsis: Hector arrives at the hospital seriously injured and dies during surgery. Alejandro performed the operation and gets blamed for his death.
episodes.title: Capítulo 110

episodes.synopsis: Rubí is sure that Hector died because Alejandro looked after Rubí. Rubí turns cold and indifferent after Hector's death. Alejandro goes to jail.
episodes.title: Capítulo 111

episodes.synopsis: Paco admits his attraction to Ingrid and Lorena dumps him. They learn a medication given to Hector caused complications. Alejandro gets out of jail.
episodes.title: Capítulo 112

episodes.synopsis: Ernesto learns his father lied to him about Alejandro and confesses that his father is to blame for Hector's death. Bermúdez kills Lucio and his son.
episodes.title: Capítulo 113

episodes.synopsis: After Lucio dies, Elena acts like Rubí and loses everything in the stock market. Genaro proves that Hector didn't kill Rubí's baby. Elena is pregnant.
episodes.title: Capítulo 114

episodes.synopsis: Rubí has bad thoughts about the accident and still wants to get revenge. Cayetano dies. Maribel and Alejandro finally get married, in despite of Rubí.
episodes.title: Capítulo 115
